channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tesla Shareholders Approve Elon Musk’s Makes $1 Trillion Pay Package
item.description: The unprecedented pay day will go into full effect by 2035—as long as Tesla hits ambitious financial and production targets.

item.title: High price of a vinyl collection putting you off? Follow my lead and get this new one-stop-shop turntable
item.description: Majority Folio turntable review: a simple and easy-to-use record player that won't break the bank.

item.title: A new Mac killer, or the end for Windows in China? Huawei reveals China-only desktop PCs with its own office software and CPUs
item.description: Huawei launches two Kirin 9000X-powered desktops using fully Chinese operating systems, signaling deeper efforts toward technological self-reliance.

item.title: Why Is the AI Czar Already Saying OpenAI Won’t Get a Bailout?
item.description: Speedrunning a bubble.

item.title: Accel backs Uber rival Rapido as Prosus boosts stake
item.description: TVS Motor booked a 152% return as it sold its Rapido stake to Accel and Prosus.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto VI is delayed — again
item.description: Perhaps one of the most anticipated video games of all time, GTA VI is now slated for a November 19, 2026 release.

item.title: Why Gainax’s ‘Gunbuster’ Pose Is More Than Anime Rule of Cool Reference Fodder
item.description: Unlike the 'Akira Slide,' this iconic mech gesture endures as anime's tender, unyielding act of defiance.

item.title: Tesla Shareholders Decide Elon Musk Should Be the World’s First Trillionaire
item.description: 75% of shareholders voted to approve the pay plan.

item.title: Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s $1T pay package
item.description: The proposal received more than 75% approval. Musk can earn the $1 trillion in shares over the next 10 years if Tesla hits a number of milestones.

item.title: GTA 6 repoussé (encore) : Rockstar joue avec nos nerfs
item.description: Rockstar vient de repousser GTA 6 de six mois supplémentaires. Sortie désormais prévue pour novembre 2026. Si vous avez un sentiment de déjà-vu, c'est normal : c'est le deuxième report pour ce jeu qui devait déjà sortir en 2025.

item.title: Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s $1 trillion pay package
item.description: Tesla shareholders voted Thursday to approve Elon Musk’s staggering new pay package, in a move aimed at retaining the controversial CEO’s leadership during a time of great upheaval for the automaker. Over 75 percent of shares voted in favor of the proposal. The vote gives Musk enormous sway over his electric vehicle company, as well […]

item.title: Laude Institute announces first batch of ‘Slingshots’ AI grants
item.description: Slingshots AI grants provide resources that would be unavailable in most academic settings. Its debut program has 15 startups focused on AI evaluation.

item.title: A New Pair of Anti-Meta Smart Glasses Are on the Way
item.description: Even Realities has a new pair of smart glasses coming, and unlike Meta's Ray-Ban glasses, it may not have cameras or speakers.

item.title: $120 Million Crypto Hack Blamed on Office Space-Style Exploit
item.description: Insert your favorite Office Space quote here.

item.title: Google's next moonshot wants to shoot AI data centers into space - orbiting Suncatcher facilities will be equipped with AI TPUs
item.description: Google’s Project Suncatcher aims to build orbital AI data centers powered by sunlight, testing TPUs, optical links, and economic sustainability.

item.title: Jeu vidéo | La sortie du très attendu GTA VI encore repoussée, au 19 novembre 2026
item.description: La sortie de Grand Theft Auto VI (« GTA VI »), nouvel opus de la très célèbre série de jeux vidéo d’action, prévue initialement pour l’automne 2025 puis annoncée pour le printemps, a été repoussée au 19 novembre 2026, a indiqué jeudi l’éditeur Rockstar Games.

item.title: Report: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ Is Getting a Sequel and the Gang Is All Back
item.description: Gareth Edwards is expected to return along with stars Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, and Mahershala Ali.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto VI launch delayed until November 2026
item.description: Grand Theft Auto VI is being delayed again: it will now launch on November 19th, 2026. “We are sorry for adding additional time to what we realize has been a long wait, but these extra months will allow us to finish the game with the level of polish you have come to expect and deserve,” […]

item.title: Meta estimates that it earns 10% of its revenue from scams, report says
item.description: These fraudulent ads purport to offer a product or service that isn't actually real, and may be intended to solicit payments from less savvy users.

item.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI has $20B ARR and about $1.4 trillion in data center commitments
item.description: Altman named a long list of upcoming business he thinks will generate significant revenue.

item.title: Amazon offers AI translation for self-published Kindle books
item.description: Amazon is making it easier for self-published authors to release their ebooks in multiple languages with Kindle Translate, a new AI translation tool that launched in beta on Thursday to a limited number of Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) authors. In its early form, it can translate between English and Spanish and from German to English, […]

item.title: TikTok Billionaire Is Making Bari Weiss’s ‘Anti-Woke’ College Tuition Free
item.description: The University of Austin just received a generous gift from a deep-pocketed benefactor.

item.title: Venomous ‘Murder Hornets’ Kill Two American Tourists on Vacation in Laos
item.description: The victims were stung dozens of times and suffered severe anaphylactic shock.
